front.title: Session Description Protocol (SDP) Media Capabilities Negotiation

abstract.t: Session Description Protocol (SDP) capability negotiation provides a general framework for indicating and negotiating capabilities in SDP. The base framework defines only capabilities for negotiating transport protocols and attributes. This documents extends the framework by defining media capabilities that can be used to negotiate media types and their associated parameters.
This document updates the IANA Considerations of RFC 5939.
